text: The Sirsa Branch, built in 1896C.A.H. Townsend, Final report of thirds revised revenue settlement of Hisar district from 1905-1910, Gazetteer of Department of Revenue and Disaster Management, Haryana, point 29. and originating at Indri, is a sub-branch of Sirsa branch of Western Yaumna Canal which menders through Kaithal district, Jind district, Fatehabad district and Sirsa district.Western yaumna Canal ProjectDelhibird.com ==References== Category:Canals in India
title: Sirsa branch
